Name: Fighter's Challenge
Description:
When you target an enemy with an attack, that enemy is Marked until end of your next turn.
Enemies Marked by you trigger Opportunity Attacks from you when Shifting or violating a Mark.

Name: Guardian's Opportunity
Description:
You add your Wisdom to your Reaction Modifier.
Your Reaction attacks deal extra damage equal to your Wisdom.

Name: Weapon Mastery
Description: You gain +1 Hit with weapon attacks

Name: Heavy Armor Specialist
Description: Your total Armor Penalty to Skills is halved

Name: Controller Feat
Description: You gain a bonus Feat from the Controller Feat category.

Name: Evoker's Barrage
Description:
Add your Dexterity to your Miss Damage.
Add your Dexterity to the range of your Ranged and Area attacks.

Name: Wizard Flexibility
Description: You gain an additional At-Will attack power.

Name: Master Ritualist
Description:
You gain Ritual Training as a bonus lesser feat.
You learn an additional Heroic Ritual from each Ritual Training lesser feat.
You learn an additional Paragon Ritual from each Paragon Ritual Training lesser feat.
You learn an additional Epic Ritual from each Epic ritual Training lesser feat.

Name: Controller Feat
Description: You gain a bonus Feat from the Controller Feat category.

Name: Abjurer
Description:
You add double your Constitution to your Hit Points.
You gain +1 AC.

Name: Wizard Flexibility
Description: You gain an additional At-Will attack power.

Name: Master Ritualist
Description:
You gain Ritual Training as a bonus lesser feat.
You learn an additional Heroic Ritual from each Ritual Training lesser feat.
You learn an additional Paragon Ritual from each Paragon Ritual Training lesser feat.
You learn an additional Epic Ritual from each Epic ritual Training lesser feat.

Name: Sneak Attack
Description:
While wielding a Light Weapon, when you hit on an attack with Advantage you deal +2d6 damage. If the attack has multiple targets or multiple attack rolls, this extra damage is halved.
Increase the extra damage to +3d6 at level 11, and to +5d6 at level 21.

Name: Rogue Ambush
Description: On the first round of combat, gain Advantage against enemies that have not acted yet.

Name: Scoundrel Move
Description: You gain a bonus to all defenses agains Opportunity Attacks equal to double your Charisma.

Name: Weapon Finesse
Description: +1 Hit with Off-hand weapons and Slings.

Name: Light Weapon
Description: You treat the following weapons as Light Weapons: Light Blades, Crossbows, Slings.

Name: Healing Word
Description: You gain the Healing Word power.

Name: Faith Healing
Description:
When you use a Healing power, add your Charisma to the Surge Value of any character spending a Surge.
When you use a character to full health, that character gains Shield Points equal to your Charisma.

Name: Shield of the Gods
Description: Attacks without Advantage made against you or any ally within 5 squares gain -1 Crit Range.

Name: Ritual Training
Description: You gain Ritual Training as a bonus lesser feat.

Name: Rage Strike
Description: You gain the Rage Strike power.

Name: Savage Attack
Description: Your attacks deal +Constitution damage.

Name: Raging Resilience
Description: You add your Constitution to your Surge Value.

Name: Barbarian Charge
Description: When you charge an enemy within 4 or more squares, you gain +2 hit, and you can use a Barbarian melee attack instead of a melee Basic attack.

Name: Savage Skill
Description: You add your Constitution to your Intimidate skill and your Nature skill.
